General.Name: Firm Capital Apartment Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: Firm Capital Apartment Real Estate Investment Trust operates as a multi-residential real estate investment company in the United States. It owns interest in approximately 1,846 apartment units located in Florida, Connecticut, Texas, New York, New Jersey, Georgia, and Maryland; and provides preferred capital secured by multi-family residential real estate properties. The company qualifies as a real estate investment trust for federal income tax purposes. It generally would not be subject to federal corporate income taxes if it distributes at least 90% of its taxable income to its stockholders. The company was formerly known as Firm Capital American Realty Partners Trust and changed its name to Firm Capital Apartment Real Estate Investment Trust in September 2020. Firm Capital Apartment Real Estate Investment Trust is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 163 Cartwright Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6A 1V5
